item.title: deploying rust in containers
item.description: The goal I am pretty familiar with containers and multi stage deployment have been my go to since quite a while now, for my golang codebases. Now that I have been picking up rust, deploying my first rust service in production did bring me back to my usual habits of containerization. We’ll be trying to optimize for speed of build and container size. The cargo.toml [...][lib]name = "vs"path = "src/lib.rs"[[bin]]name = "vs"path = "src/bin/vs.
